      Methods in io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi that return Color 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Color Color.fromHSB(int hue, int saturation, int brightness)
      Creates an HSB instance of Color without probability.
      static Color Color.fromHSB(int hue, int saturation, int brightness, double probability)
      Creates an HSB instance of Color with probability.
      static Color Color.fromRGB(int red, int green, int blue)
      Creates an RGB instance of Color without probability.
      static Color Color.fromRGB(int red, int green, int blue, double probability)
      Creates an RGB instance of Color with probability.
      Color Panel.getColor()
      Gets the color of the panels.
      Color Aurora.State.getColor()
      Gets the current color (HSB/RGB) of the Aurora.
      Note: This only works if the Aurora is displaying a solid color.
      Color[] Effect.getPalette()
      Gets the color palette of the effect.
